name: The Overgrown
description:
A game that answers the question, "Wouldn't it be fucked up if pesticides turned people into monsters?"

Spoiler alert: yes it would be.

Play as Sapphire as she returns to her family's home after running away years ago only to find it overrun by mutated monsters. Help her find her family and discover what really happened there.  Help her shoot stuff with a gun. Jump on some platforms. Wahoo!

Content warning for transphobia, homophobia, familial abuse, blood and gore

I don't think the flashing is fast or intense enough to cause seizures but look out for flashing lasers on level 4 and 5
